definition: tortoise shell and animal bones used in divination/oracle bone inscriptions (an early form of Chinese script)

first of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/(used for an unspecified person or thing)/first (in a list, as a party to a contract etc)/letter "A" or roman "I" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/armor plating/shell or carapace/(of the fingers or toes) nail/bladed leather or metal armor (old)/ranking system used in the Imperial examinations (old)/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)/ancient Chinese compass point: 75°
bone
oracle script/oracle bone inscriptions (an early form of Chinese script)
oracle script/oracle bone character (an early form of Chinese script)
turbinate/nasal concha

sentences.english: But these are products that Oracle sells.
sentences.chinese: 但這些都是甲骨文公司銷售的產品。

sentences.english: There has been no other contact with Oracle since then.
sentences.chinese: 從那以後，我們和甲骨文再沒有任何接觸。

sentences.english: The original characters are Oracle, popular in the Shang period.
sentences.chinese: 最初的漢字是甲骨文，盛行於殷商時期。

sentences.english: In terms of antitrust, Oracle also seems safe.
sentences.chinese: 在反托拉斯方面甲骨文似乎也是安全的。

sentences.english: He had served as chief technology officer of Oracle's client software group.
sentences.chinese: 高斯林曾擔任甲骨文客戶軟件部的首席技術官。

sentences.english: The question is: what exactly does the cloud mean to Oracle?
sentences.chinese: 問題是，雲究竟對於甲骨文公司意味着什麼？

sentences.english: Outside the bronze inscription, he also involves Oracle study.
sentences.chinese: 金文之外，孫氏又涉及甲骨文研究。

sentences.english: Oracle and Microsoft were both born in difficult economic times.
sentences.chinese: 甲骨文和微軟恰恰就是產生在經濟低谷期。

sentences.english: Oracle should be the first to write with a brush, then use the weapon carved.
sentences.chinese: 甲骨文也應該是先用毛筆寫出，然後再用利器刻出的。

sentences.english: The symbols inscribed on pottery earlier than the Shang Dynasty bear resemblance to the Shang oracles.
sentences.chinese: 夏商以前的陶紋刻符與商代的甲骨文有相似之處。

sentences.english: But HP and Oracle reaffirmed a commitment to their partnership on Monday.
sentences.chinese: 但是，週一惠普和甲骨文重申他們的夥伴關係。

sentences.english: These writings are  incisions on bones and tortoise shell.
sentences.chinese: 這些文字均爲甲骨雕文。

sentences.english: Simplified Chinese characters from Oracle to the evolutionary history of a continuous and verifiable.
sentences.chinese: 簡體字來自於連續可證明的甲骨文的進化史。

sentences.english: In Village South Series, identical soothsaying texts on Oracle Bones in Lizu and Wumingzu have different traits.
sentences.chinese: 屯南系列甲骨卜辭中歷組和無名組同文卜辭各具特點。

sentences.english: The oracle bones from South of Xiaotun Locus were first discovered scientifically in 1973 since the founding of New China.
sentences.chinese: 小屯南地甲骨是新中國第一批科學發掘的甲骨。

definition: oracle script/oracle bone character (an early form of Chinese script)
oracle bone/bone used for divination, esp. animal scapula
rubbings from a tablet
inscription in bronze/bell-cauldron inscription
oracle inscriptions of the Shang Dynasty (16th-11th century BC) on tortoiseshells or animal bones
bamboo slip used for record keeping during the Han Dynasty
early form of Chinese characters inscribed in stone, a precursor of the small seal 小篆[xiao3 zhuan4]
the great seal/used narrowly for 籀文/used broadly for many pre-Qin scripts
bronze implement/refers to ancient bronze artifacts, from c. 2,000 BC
to read and interpret ancient texts/to decipher
ritual objects/sacral vessels
Yinxu, ruins of Yinshang 殷商 city at Anyang 安陽|安阳 in Henan province, a World Heritage site
bamboo writing slips in ancient times (joined together to form whole scrolls)
pictogram/hieroglyph
carving in bone
oracle tortoise shell
